activities: Medpace Clinical Pharmacology is an advanced, 63-bed facility specializing in early phase clinical trials. It is led by a team of highly trained clinical researchers who are experts in the design, implementation, and analysis of Phase I - IIa studies. Medpace Clinical Pharmacology provides worldwide clinical research and development of pharmaceutical products. During research and development, it collects and processes data relating to study participants from study investigators. This data is collected and transferred to the United States in order to fulfill its business responsibilities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually and Electronically Processed, Human Resources data, clinical trial data, customer data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
